Title: Welcome the launching of the Soviet space rocket
Publisher: Tianjin meishu chubanshe (天津美术出版社)
Notes: Nezha (哪吒), with Wind Fire Wheels, is a protective deity in Chinese folk religion. "Heaven" is depicted as peopled with traditional Chinese deities, including the moon goddess Chang'e (嫦娥).
Theme: Foreign Friends: Soviet UnionChinese Space Program
